transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji boliye
Executive: Haan Mr. Ramu ji se baat ho rahi hai na Hydro Green Technology se.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Parul bol rahi hu IndiaMART se, senior manager baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Bolo bolo.
Executive: Haan ji sir main bol rahi thi aapke jo products hai like aap ye treatment plants mein deal kar rahe hain. Right? Do mahine ho gaye sir aapki service ko live hue 17 September ko live hui thi aapki service. Right? To usme sir kuch aapko gain hua do mahine mein like kuch inquiries click hui sir?
Customer: Nahi hua hai.
Executive: Nahi hua hai. Dekhiye sir service mein na bahut jyada nahi use kari to matlab uske piche kya reason hai?
Customer: Mam agar mere paas lead nahi aayega to main free mein to aapko paisa thodi dunga main. Ye batao do mahina mein ek bhi lead nahi aaya STP mein jo kaam karta hu. Maine usko bola STP ETP ke kaam karta hu. Sewage treatment plant aur effluent treatment plant.
Executive: Effluent aur sewage hai na sir yahi karte hain na.
Customer: Yahi karta hi hai. Aap mujhe de raha hai lead biogas ke bola lead utha lo fir wo hoga. Are main pagal kutta kaat raha hai kya kahe mein paisa diya maine. Aapka team se phone aata hai nahi aap isko aap jab tak lead nahi uthaoge to kaise aapka wo hoga. Are bhai humko sikhao.
Executive: Aapke kaam ki nahi aayegi to kaise uthaoge aap. Haan sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir aap mujhe bataye aapko lead kaun si jagah se chahiye matlab all over India se aayegi to karoge.
Customer: All over India se nahi mujhe chahiye bhaiya hamara paisa wapas kar do. IndiaMART ke bas ki nahi baat hai, thik hai. Ya to nahi to hum bol boli se nahi chalte hain. Humko mail karo bhaiya ki hum aapko mahine mein do hi lead denge. Lekin denge.
Executive: Meri baat sun lijiye.
Customer: Aur nahi denge to likhiye. Meri baat sun lijiye mujhe likh ke do mein ek mahina mein do lead bhi nahi aayega to us pe aapko fine lagega main fine marunga. Wahi kaam kar paunga main aisa. Nahi to nahi kar payenge hum.
Executive: Sir dekho lead to main agar aapko batau ki apne paas lead kitni hai. Effluent treatment plant ki sir ho jati hai matlab month mein na 200 ke kareeb lead generate ho jati hai sir.
Customer: Mam mere paas do mahina mein kyun nahi aaya?
Executive: Sir aapka haan main aapka bata rahi hu sir aapne jo lead consume kari hai pure month mein main bata deti hu sir aapko.
Customer: Ye batao.
Executive: Aapne sewage ki sir aapne last month October mein ek lead consume kari thi sir. Aur effluent ki bhi kari thi sir. Hmm. Last month aapne ek ek lead consume kari thi.
Customer: Haan sewage ki.
Executive: Wo wo biogas ke tha samajh gaye.
Customer: Nahi biogas alag hai, bioreactor alag hai sir.
Executive: Main to sabhi plants ki category ki baat kar rahi hu sir ji.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To aapne aise do lead kyunki sir ye plants hai to thoda sa na inko ye deals matlab close hone mein thoda sa time lagta hai to bas main jaana chah rahi thi ki bade bade plant hai sir matlab 25-25 lakh ke bhi hote hain to depend karta hai.
Customer: Do teen crore ke karte hain hum.
Executive: Haan matlab aap matlab depend karta hai na sir koi paanch ka bhi hai koi matlab karodo mein.
Customer: To sir ye deal thoda sa na close hone mein time lagta hai but aapne jo do lead consume kiye hain to jo do buyer mile aapko IndiaMART se uska kya feedback hai like sir wo.
Executive: Mam wo wo jo lead tha na wo biogas ke tha.
Customer: Pehle main bol raha hu unhone mere pehle baat sun lijiye humne unse baat kiya client se sir inhone galat dala hai humko chahiye biogas.
Customer: Thik hai pehle baat suniye haan.
Executive: Haan haan achcha.
Executive: To matlab lead aapne dekhi kharidi sewage ki lekin baad mein wo nikli biogas lead aap ye keh rahe hain.
Customer: Biogas.
Executive: Achcha. Okay. To pure abhi do mahino mein aapne koi bhi lead nahi consume kari hai STP aur effluent ki sir.
Customer: Mam aa raha hai biogas ke to main kya consume karunga ye to mujhe aap hamare wo khol ke dekh lijiye ki abhi bhi lead kya aake pada hua hai. Aisa ki nahi main on nahi karta hai main mobile mein hi mobile mein bhi ek step hai. Main dekhta rehta hu lekin mujhe biogas ke dega to kya jaruri hai mujhe kyun consume karenge. Hum to nahi karenge.
Executive: To sir khali biogas to nahi hai sir aur bhi hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Are mam dekh lo na mere paas main aapko screenshot bhej du. Ab jo aayega wahi to.
Executive: Sir aap ye khali aap to matlab all over India karenge na kahin se bhi lead aayega to plant.
Customer: Hum all over India bola hai usko. Hum ye nahi ki bihar mein mujhe karna hai. Main baitha hua delhi mein bihar mein nahi baithe hue. Mera branch office delhi mein hai.
Executive: Achcha branch office aapka delhi mein hai.
Customer: Haan. Aur jo banda paisa le gaya hai usko wo delhi se leke gaya hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Bihar aake nahi leke gaya hai wo.
Executive: Aapka address Bihar ka tha na sir to isliye maine socha ki aapka office wahi to nahi hai sir Bihar mein.
Customer: Mam pehle jab check gaya hai na wo bank account delhi ka hai. Bihar ka hai hi nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha par ye jo hydro green technology hai sir ispe jo contact address hai wo aapke Bihar mein hai.
Customer: Wo dekhiye do address hai mere paas suniye. Do address hai delhi ka alag hai. Haan.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Dusra address haan to bataye humne bola tha jo aapka account manager humko jo hamare company ke bana rakha hai IndiaMART humne bola bhai office mera yahan pe location bhejaata hu ek din baith jao mere sath mere paas time tha us samay ek din aake bhai mere samne kar lo. Nahi hum to nahi jaate hain bhai nahi jaate to bhai koi baat nahi.
Executive: Kaam karo tum wahan se. Kahan hai sir aapka office delhi mein?
Customer: Mera hai Baprola bhi Dwarka mod ke paas.
Executive: Dwarka mod ke paas hai. Haan. Achcha to sir ji aisa kar sakte hain ki aap agar video meet pe aaye to thoda sa catalog review kar lenge agar aap video meet pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aayenge hum paanch baar aa gaye hum nahi aane wale abhi.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi na 17 December se.
Customer: Dekhiye mam game game khel ke humko fayda nahi hai thik hai. Hum log karte hain seedha kaam thik hai. Hame game game nahi khelna ki video meet pe aa jao ye aa jao. Ab nahi aana hai thik hai hame karna hai close. Kyunki hum dekh liye ki IndiaMART ke bas ki baat nahi hai. Paisa le gaya koi baat nahi kaat ke dena hai de do aur nahi dega to main jo karna hoga main karenge. Wo bhi jhulega main bhi jhulege bas yahi kahani hai. Paisa diye to aise hum to chodenge nahi.
Executive: Okay to aap jitna service chal gaya hai utna aap deduct karke de do paisa wapas.
Customer: Haan hum dusre company se.
Executive: Sir ji main possibility ek baar check kar leti hu fir main aapko bata deti hu sir shaam tak.
Customer: To mam aapki aap kis liye phone kiye the mujhe ye bata dijiye.
Executive: Sir isliye phone kiya tha aapka problem samajhne ke liye maine phone kiya tha.
Customer: Mam itna samajhna nahi wo banda ko jo arman kya naam hai usko samjha diya tha bola ki hamara senior manager phone karega to ye samajhna nahi hai mujhe samajhna samajhna hai hi nahi ab mujhe.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Thik hai.
Customer: Aap jitna harass harass kijiyega agar paisa nahi aaya to utna main case dal denge ab.
Executive: Nahi nahi main ek baar aapko shaam tak ek baar revert back karti hu sir thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Shaam tak ka time dijiye I'll get back to you sir. Thik hai. Thik hai fir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads (biogas instead of STP/ETP).

- Wants a refund if relevant leads not provided.

- Frustrated with IndiaMART's service and communication.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue and apologized.

- Executive promised to check refund possibility.

- Executive will revert by the end of the day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to revert with refund possibility by evening.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, biogas, stp, etp
